thread.title: The Graham Norton Show
thread.title_full: TV | The Graham Norton Show - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: The Graham Norton Show
text: It's a very Irish couch tonight with both Colin Farrell and Chris O'Dowd joining Graham for a chat. We're expecting many the Irish in-jokes amongst them. Colin will be on chatting about his new flick The Lobster, and will be joined by his co-star Rachel Weisz, while O'Dowd will be talking about his latest role as journalist David Walsh in the new Lance Armstrong film The Program. Joining them will be the always hilarious Dawn French who talks about her new novel According to Yes and to top things off, the one and only Rod Stewart will be on performing from his new album Another Country. Can't really ask for much better than that now can we?
